name: KuchiSake Pumpkin
description:
A little game for the 89th Mini Jam, based off the famous japanese myth kuchisake onna.

A little dating advice for begginers, if she ask you if she is beautiful...RUN!

Controls

  • Arrows - Movement/Menu
  • P - Pause/Resume
  • Space - Select

Credits

  • Art: https://fuann.itch.io/
  • Programming: https://kaakas.itch.io/
  • Credit to https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/ for the background music.

Play it in fullscreen!
